name: Tregua
description:
"Shortcuts" comes from a series of physical paper-cutting works made by Bernardo Liu. Inspired by the popular culture of paper cutting in China, "Shortcuts" brings the artist's imagery represented by his memories in Brazil, experiencing and mixing with the language of oriental paper cutouts. 
part of the alterhen.art exhibition III - 2022 - @bernardoliu / bernardoliu.com
